import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Container, Navbar, Nav, Button, FormControl, Form, } from "react-bootstrap"; import logo from "./logo192.png"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from "react-router-dom"; import Home from "../pages/Home.js"; import About from "../pages/About.js"; import Contacts from "../pages/Contacts.js"; import Blog from "./../pages/Blog.js"; export default class Header extends Component { render() { return ( <> React site
Home About us Contacts Blog
); } }
